body: I don't see this. Can you post a screenshot?
As an example:
Ah I see. Yes that should be fixed.
A more major concern there is that the TF/Keras docs don't show up. Presumably because it can't import TF during the doc building.
Hang on -- the code should be displayed though?
The `# Set the parameters for â€¦` stuff? Yeah, it should be set like the examples in 1D and 2D.
The output of the [sklearn-transformer example](https://www.kymat.io/gallery_2d/plot_sklearn.html#sphx-glr-gallery-2d-plot-sklearn-py) is also broken maybe?
So in the example Edouard gave, I don't understand what is happening. Does anybody know what's going on?

> A more major concern there is that the TF/Keras docs don't show up. Presumably because it can't import TF during the doc building.

The code for MNIST-keras is shown though?

> So in the example Edouard gave, I don't understand what is happening. Does anybody know what's going on?

It's a matter of spacing and parsing .. I think the doc requires also a `import tensorflow`... reopening miles 2.

do you have enough a handle on it to be able to fix it?

Otherwise, can you point me to where I need to look to understand what is going on?

issue.title: DOC Fix missing blank line in 3D doc example

repository.name: kymatio
repository.description: Wavelet scattering transforms in Python with GPU acceleration

issue.title: Circle CI doesn't have TF

repository.name: kymatio
repository.description: Wavelet scattering transforms in Python with GPU acceleration

issue.body:
As a result, the docs for TF and Keras are not generated (see discussion in #595). Issue seems to be that TF is not installed. The Circle CI log has this
```
WARNING: autodoc: failed to import module 'tensorflow' from module 'kymatio'; the following exception was raised:
No module named 'tensorflow'
WARNING: autodoc: failed to import module 'keras' from module 'kymatio'; the following exception was raised:
No module named 'tensorflow'
```
Can probably be solved by adding `pip install tensorflow` after https://github.com/kymatio/kymatio/blob/9df4b37e49e78e174cdacf436ee8e78315fcbd19/.circleci/config.yml#L49
